TopicTitle: The Kerman Sisters, first kerbals to achive powered flight!

Articles.Content: ...But I MORE than made a video, I completely envisioned what an old-time TV program would show you as well.  Complete with what it must have SOUNDED like as well!  Thanks to the Internet Archive...Hey, we have Wilbur and Orville.  They must have THEIR version of them too...

achive = achieve sorry but it's on your video title as well.

I like the effect but it needs speeding up

I'd just speed it up, ever seen those old films (like this one appears to be), everyone is running around double time like a Benny Hill skit because the first movie cameras had a low frame rate...  Do that, it will help speed up the action and look even more authentic.

@tg626 for now, you can go to the youtube settings menu and select a different speed.

Great Job!
